meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>government</kanji> <kanji>colleague</kanji> is a <vocabulary>bureaucrat</vocabulary>, or a <vocabulary>government official</vocabulary>. The one who works for and is part of the <vocabulary>bureaucracy</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
